name: Justina Vasquez
bio: Justina Vasquez is a writer on the project and a junior at UNC-Chapel Hill majoring in business journalism with an ~unofficial~ minor in data journalism & visualization. She enjoys being part of innovation in the media industry and prefers jazz music and Greys Anatomy to many other pastimes.

name: Alexis Barnes
bio: Alexis Barnes, aka the 360 Stitch Master, is a junior, studying multimedia journalism, media production, and history. Alexis is a developer for the Old Man At Sea story and works with post-production of the 360 videos. At any time she can be spotted sitting at a computer listening to music.

name: Anne Marie Hagerty
bio: Anne Marie Hagerty is a Broadcast Journalism major with a History and Music minor at the UNC-Chapel Hill and works as an Assignment Editor for NBC-affiliate, WRAL-TV News, on the weekends. Anne Marie is pursuing a career as an international political news reporter with a focus on humanitarian issues. Anne Marie likes to play anything by Chopin on the piano, pretend she is good at running, indulge with coffee ice cream and watch New Girl in her free time.
